images.caption: Each member has their own personalised account.
Servers located on-site in club room.

info.label: What I did
list: Data visualizations of all members and their added social media accounts on cshub home page.
Users may create and edit their profile, and browse through others.
Receive email notifications on new events, comment, and confirm attendance.
Responsive design allows comfortable use on mobile devices.
info.text: As the technical exec of the Computer Science club, I built a mini social networking site for our members. Here are some of the features:
